localized title: Aa Chhe Aapni Dosti Unlimited Yaar
plot outline: ABHI, aged 29, is ready to join his duty as a Collector with the mix feelings of satisfaction and dissatisfaction. Satisfaction, As he had achieved all in his life today what his father dreamed for. Dissatisfaction, because to achieve all this, he lost his love Aastha, true friends Sam and Fenil. Abhi decides to meet them all again and apologise for his deeds. Dosti Unlimited is a real life journey of LOVE, LIFE and FRIENDSHIP. It explains us the true value of relationships with friends, family and our loved ones.
title: Aa Chhe Aapni Dosti Unlimited Yaar
akas: Aa Chhe Aapni Dosti Unlimited Yaar (India)
plot: ABHI, aged 29, is ready to join his duty as a Collector with the mix feelings of satisfaction and dissatisfaction. Satisfaction, As he had achieved all in his life today what his father dreamed for. Dissatisfaction, because to achieve all this, he lost his love Aastha, true friends Sam and Fenil. Abhi decides to meet them all again and apologise for his deeds. Dosti Unlimited is a real life journey of LOVE, LIFE and FRIENDSHIP. It explains us the true value of relationships with friends, family and our loved ones.::Piyush Rajnikant Pandya

Story of a young and dynamic Abhi (Abhijat Trivedi), A sweet, calm Girl Aastha Parikh, A Father, Vinayak Trivedi who is Possessive on the goal of life.. True Friends like Sam (Sameer Shah) and Feku (Fenil Kukreja) - A struggle to tally all the forms of relationships. A description of true need and importance of relationships and goal in everybody's life.::Piyush Rajnikant Pandya
